structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Administrative Office of the Courts annual report and Kentucky Uniform Crime Report may be combined.
law.text: The Administrative Office of the Courts may combine its annual report in KRS 27A.460 with the Kentucky Uniform Crime Report.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.66, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 23, effective July 15, 1986.
